attributes.review: 💖✨💗 Hello this is Kim Kardashian West, I would like to say that god took his time on many💞🥰🥰🥰🥰you were rushed😩💘💕🧚🏽. This lovely 💞 orange 💞wants to take down an app that my kids love 💘💝. I see no harm on TikTok, it has taught my beautiful kids how to do so many wonderful things like getting tickets for Trumps rally to not show up 🥰🦄. I am leaving this review bc you inspire me 💕🧚‍♀️✨ to use birth control 🌈⭐️🧡🥰.
attributes.title: Nobody’s perfect 😈👺🎃 but you aren’t  🤡💩🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.review: This is by far the WORST app I have come in contact with. This app does not work, it won’t even load, once it does it is just full of hate speech and very offensive slurs. I am very convinced this app is linked to a cult related to human trafficking. That’s why it should get deleted. For those who are thinking of installing it DONT!!! The worst decision you’ll ever make it even sends viruses to your phone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP ITS HORRIBLE!
attributes.title: Horrendous

attributes.review: In my opinion, this app does not have good resources and, right when I downloaded it I think I almost gagged because of how poorly made this app was... AS many said we mostly agree that this app should get off the App Store because this app is not APPROPRIATE for others. It is a very bad bias and is forcing others to support this man 👨 so my very best option is to get this app off the AppStore pLEASEEEE I’M BEGGING U
attributes.title: “Stop this madness” 👁👄👁

attributes.review: I literally think this is the worst app ever! It glitches soooo much as so much incorrect spelling like who spells caight come on!! The amount of ads!! The quality is horrible too! It’s too orange and old! Also tell me why my camera went into use when I was using the app... it’s used to spy on ppl!! A complete violation of my privacy! All in all tiktok is a waaay better app than this junk 👎🏻
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I don’t know how this app got rated number one in news. I can’t even log in without entering my mobile phone number and I will not be doing that. After reading the terms and conditions, just by signing up I am meant to be bonded to the trump 2020 make America great again campaign. Since I refuse to do so, I deleted the app and can’t read any fake news. Disappointed
attributes.title: Saddening

attributes.review:
The worst app ever! It took 1 whole week to download😰 Becasue of this I am not voting for Trump! Very bad!! Trump you idiot just give up... our generation is so powerful & you think that just because you’re taking an app away from us we’ll stop bugging you? The fact of the matter is we’re never going to go away. Anyways.. bad app boooo no good😥🤬 

- 😘 gen z
attributes.title: I bet you’re wishing you didn’t try us...

attributes.review: As much as i support trump, i wouldn’t support him repealing the second amendment, and this is the same. Banning tik tok would give easy access to any american politician to ban any app, and that’s just not cool; just as repealing the second amendment would allow for corruption to make its way to the first amendment. If Trump does decide to give this power to any corrupted leader, my vote will go to Jo Jorgensen.
attributes.title: don’t allow for easy corruption

attributes.review: now that i have your attention trump, you are the biggest idiot i know. you’re much more worried an app tracking people (which has been proven to not be true yet your still trying to get it taken down) then lives that are being taken in the US, lives that are homeless on the streets, lives in poverty and etc. learn to prioritize things that actually matter. goodbye
attributes.title: WORST CAMPAIGN APP EVER

attributes.review: I’m doing this from a vid I saw, but also cuz I hate Donald trump, he’s racist and homophobic. He doesn’t care about all lives he only cares about the lives that are “normal” aka straight white people that don’t cause problems. Well I’m apart of the Gen Z and I feel like all of this is dumb, we shouldn’t have to fight for black peoples rights. They should have it but they don’t. We won’t give up with out a fight. ✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: Tik tok

attributes.review: This app supports anti LGBT and racism it’s absolutely disgusting and goes against any moral views the person who runs this has made so many disturbing comments about his daughter and women and has let thousands of people die and this app keeps on crashing on me and making my phone crash as well so I highly DONT recommend this it’s a terrible app
attributes.title: I hate it worst thing ever on the apple store
